local_intent: Perform the second push of the T-block along 0 degrees after confirming visibility and alignment, keep yaw at 90 deg, then verify alignment near the target outline.
assumptions: Block is roughly pre-positioned from the first push
TCP yaw may already be 90 deg
Targets t_block and target_T are valid scene labels
coherence_with_global: Implements the second Push(t_block, 0 deg, 0.1 m) with preceding align and yaw check; concludes with ApproachAndAlign to target_T as the immediate post-push verification, consistent with GLOBAL_BT flow.
